name: End of the Line
description:
After you play an Action Card and no cards of the same name were in your initial deck for this match: This card gains 1 Catch point. (Max 2 stacks)
When a character uses a Skill: If there are Catch points already, consume all points for this Skill to deal +1 DMG, then draw 1 card for each point consumed.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After you play an Action Card and no cards of the same name were in your initial deck for this match:</color> This card gains 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Catch</color> point. (Max 2 stacks)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When a character uses a Skill:</color> If there are <color=#FFFFFFFF>Catch</color> points already, consume all points for this Skill to deal +1 DMG, then draw 1 card for each point consumed.
